Package org.hardroid.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActivityRecognitionListener
    This interface is a contract to receive notifications from ActivityRecognitionManager when a new result is available
    OnClientConnectionListener
    This interface is a contract to listen to connection changes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityRecognitionClient
    The main entry point for Activity Recognition Service integration This class is used for requesting activity updates.
    ActivityRecognitionManager
    This class provides access to the activity recognition services.
    ActivityRecognitionUpdatesReceiver
    This class provides interaction with the alarm manager in order to periodically get activity recognition results
    InstallServiceActivity
    Dialog Activity to Install the Service
